name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Freshly grilled chicken breast served on a bed of mixed greens with tomatoes, cucumbers, and your choice of dressing.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with meat sauce made from ground beef, tomatoes, onions, garlic, and herbs, served over spaghetti.

name: Sushi Roll
description: Assorted fresh fish and vegetables rolled in sushi rice and seaweed, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake layered with rich chocolate ganache and topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Steak
description: Tender, juicy steak cooked to your liking, served with your choice of sides.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Beer-battered fish fillets served with crispy fries, tartar sauce, and lemon wedges.

name: Margarita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy Pad Thai sauce.

name: Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with your choice of grilled meat, onions, cilantro, and salsa.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and maple syrup.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender pork ribs slathered in barbecue sauce and grilled to perfection.

name: Fried Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken pieces served with mashed potatoes, gravy, and coleslaw.

name: Greek Salad
description: Traditional Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, feta cheese, olives, and Greek dressing.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta sheets, rich meat sauce, creamy béchamel, and melted cheese, baked to perfection.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Juicy shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and white wine sauce, served over linguine.

name: Beef Stir Fry
description: Tender strips of beef stir-fried with mixed vegetables in a savory sauce, served over rice.

name: Cesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce made with butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker sandwich with layers of roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

name: Beef Burrito
description: Large flour tortilla filled with seasoned ground beef, rice, beans, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender pieces of chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce, served with rice.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup with thinly sliced beef, rice noodles, bean sprouts, basil, and lime wedges.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

name: Cobb Salad
description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, avocado, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese crumbles.

name: Hamburger
description: Classic beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun.

name: Ramen
description: Japanese noodle soup with broth, noodles, meat, and vegetables.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla.

name: Gourmet Burger
description: Premium beef patty topped with gourmet ingredients like truffle aioli, arugula, and brie cheese.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.
